This is the Home Screen.It contains the menu options so the user can access any activity from here.\nHurdles: It is preffered to provide a search widget in the Action bar.\nSolution: Use a SearchView as an action view in the app bar.Declare the searchable activity in the Android Manifest file.Then receiving the query using java code,search the data (stored online or in a SQLite database) and presenting the results in a ListView.

This is the Search Screen which can be used to initiate a search from any activity.\nHurdles: Add search functionality.\nSolution: As mentioned in Home Screen :Declare the searchable activity in the Android Manifest file.Then receiving the query using java code,search the data (stored online or in a SQLite database) and presenting the results in a ListView.
